item.title: Moving location of an interface?
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

well I changed the

            } else if(inBarrows()){
                    getPA().sendFrame99(2);
                    getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: "+barrowsKillCount, [b]4536[/b]);
                    getPA().walkableInterface(4535);

number and it moved location… I just don’t know how to control where it is by altering that number.

Read full topic

item.title: Moving location of an interface?

item.description:
@Toxic95 wrote:

item.title: Moving location of an interface?
item.dc:creator: @_Java6 `Java
item.description:
@_Java6 wrote:

the barrows kills: interface sits right on top of the multi combat one in the bottom right corner.

I was wondering if there was a way to move where an interface is located on the screen:

} else if(inBarrows()){ getPA().sendFrame99(2); getPA().sendFrame126("Kill Count: "+barrowsKillCount, 4536); getPA().walkableInterface(4535);

Is it one of those numbers that I need to change? Or is it client sided? Or even possible at all?

Read full topic
